api_en

Class AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype

  • java.lang.Object
    • api_en.AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CAG, CAG.Side, CSG, CSG.Connector, CSG.Line2D, CSG.Line3D, CSG.Path2D, CSG.Plane, CSG.Polygon, CSG.Vector2D, CSG.Vector3D, CSG.Vertex

    public class AddTransformationMethodsToPrototype
extends java.lang.Object
    Add several convenience methods to the classes that support a transform() method:
